documents.document: Google Classroom is working really nicely.
I've started using Google Classroom for the first time - it's really intuitive, and the kids really like it.

@johnlBIE the second paragraph of this post explains what Praxis was at my school in 2016. It's now a mandatory subject for all year 7.
@johnlBIE sure thing - do you mean what's the word mean, or what is the Praxis course at my school? I've explained both in a post - BRB.

@alisa_stephens thanks for the ideas! I'll have project walls w/ student work and timelines plus other stuff - so glad I have a room again.
@Smedboule don't currently have any plans for Will, but will keep that in mind if I do!
@Smedboule 💚this!
@malynmawby @AceThatTest they look interesting!
@johnqgoh I like to be original, I hear there's some weird guy who's already done those things. 😂
I get my own classroom this year! Can't wait to decorate it. What's your (or your students') fav poster or classroom feature? Pls RT #edchat
@kelmade5 thanks heaps! These will help a lot. I'll share my final version with you via the FB PBL Network. ☺️
@kelmade5 legend! Email? Do you have it? Bianca.hewes and then add the Department stuff.
@kelmade5 cool. Appreciate you sharing - I'll share the version I edit for my school context back with you. Legend!
@kelmade5 e.g. not use school name, personal info, and did you show drafts to your teacher for approval before posting online?
@kelmade5 also thinking of adding like a checklist part for sharing stuff online (e.g. Making websites) kinda digital citizenship stuff
@kelmade5 sounds good - we want something about crediting sources correctly too, so I can maybe add to yours? Ta!!
@kelmade5 let me know if you're happy to share a draft copy before them - need inspiration to start, haha.
@kelmade5 cool, would you be happy to share when you're done? ☺️
@inspirepassion @BIEpbl @hightechhigh that's a nice starting place, thanks!
Hey PBLers, does anyone have a resource/source checklist they give to students as a guide for their research? @BIEpbl @hightechhigh #pblchat
